Text: The tricorne or tricorn is a style of hat that was popular during the 18th century, falling out of style by 1800, though actually not called a "tricorne" until the mid 1800s.

<Text: Tricorne:  Tricornes with laced sides could have the laces loosened and the sides dropped down to provide better protection from the weather, sun and rain.>
